name: error-catch-notifier
description: Helpers for catching and reporting errors

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test &&  npm run compile
scripts.compile: babel src/error-catch-notifier.js --out-file dist/error-catch-notifier.js && babel src/index.js --out-file dist/index.js
scripts.lint: eslint src/error-catch-notifier.js && eslint test/error-catch-notifier-test.js && eslint src/index.js
